description: Its so awesome, literally. 5 Stars. Period.

I'm not sure why this app isn't rated a little higher. I can only assume it's because it has ads, which really do degrade the asthetic appeal of the app and make it look kind of cheap. I much prefer the look, feel, and operation of Rufus, of course. But it's asking a little much to be more like the perfection that is Rufus.
Balena Etcher works great, I've never had it malfunction or throw errors and have never had it fail to write an ISO to a removable drive. It performs it's main function without error and it does it fast. It even has quite helpful warnings when you are about to do something that probably isn't going to turn out how you expect. And it does these things for free. I can't ask for much more than that. Clean up the ads and Balena will deserve this 5-star review instead of the 4.5 it's currently earning.
summary: This app is just fine and dandy

description: Sicherlich, zum Flashen gibt es so einige Werkzeuge, auch solche, die distribution- oder desktopseitig mitgeliefert werden. Ich halte das Programm Etcher für den Goldstandard, nicht zuletzt wegen des attraktiven GUI.

Сделайте пожалуйста Flatpak и выложите на Flathub.
В ванильной Fedora Workstation 37 файл формата AppImage багует и не запускается ни через терминал ни через gui.
Всё отлично работает и записывается. На Fedora вопросов не имеется!
